Name: Treasure chest Corps-結界を維持するため、魔物を退治した
About the game: ■From long ago, monsters had appeared in this world, and had begun a war with humans. This is the Lam castle within the Heavens Kingdom. The barrier tower that was protecting the town suddenly stopped working after an unknown attack. The demons quickly invaded. To get the barrier tower up and running again, Limly the scholar and a small group of adventurers was hired for the job... [Game System] Grow your group and complete missions together! Different equipment available! Fight with your comrades to win back your peaceful lives! [Functions] WSAD : move J, left click : close range attack K, right click : skill ESC : system menu
